first_para: John Osmond (born 1946) was the director of the independent Welsh think-tank, the Institute of Welsh Affairs until May 2013. He has contributed to numerous books on the subjects of Welsh politics, culture and devolution, and is also a former journalist and television producer.

full.extract: John Osmond (born 1946) was the director of the independent Welsh think-tank, the Institute of Welsh Affairs until May 2013. He has contributed to numerous books on the subjects of Welsh politics, culture and devolution, and is also a former journalist and television producer.
full.title: John Osmond
